channel.title: Gauss gun issue with zoom
channel.description:
Gauss gun loading stuck, if do zooming during charge.
How to reproducate: 1) start charing. 2) Zoom in 3) release right mouse button. 4) zoom out.
Result: The charing sound don't stop and the ammo level don't change. I can "reset" the weapon, if I press right mouse button again.

item.title: Gauss gun issue with zoom
item.dc:creator: saxus
item.description:
Gauss gun loading stuck, if do zooming during charge.

How to reproducate:

  1. start charing.
  2. Zoom in
  3. release right mouse button.
  4. zoom out.

Result:
The charing sound don’t stop and the ammo level don’t change. I can “reset” the weapon, if I press right mouse button again.

Read full topic
